text: Shinko suru mono yo, jasui no oku o harae. Hontoni jasui wa, tokiniha tsumidearu. Muyo no sensaku o shi tari mata tagaini kageguchi shite wa naranai. Shinda kyodai no niku o, taberu no o dare ga konomou ka. Anata gata wa sore o imikiraude wanai ka. Arra o osore nasai. Hontoni arra wa tabitabi yurusa reru kata, jihibukai ho de ara reru
